storage::ParcelFileDescriptor* gaia::content::ContentProviderClient::openFileN ( const net::Uri &  uri,
const base::String &  mode 
)

See ContentProvider::openFile.

Note that this does not take care of non-content: URIs such as file:. It is strongly recommended you use the ContentResolver::openFileDescriptorN API instead.

bool gaia::content::ContentProviderClient::release ( )

Call this to indicate to the system that the associated ContentProvider is no longer needed by this ContentProviderClient.

Returns:
true if this was release, false if it was already released
